definitions.definition: A game of skill which requires the bettor to guess under which of three small cups (or thimbles ) a pea -sized object has been placed after the party operating the game rapidly rearranges them, providing opportunity for sleight-of-hand trickery ; a shell game .

main_definition: A game of skill which requires the bettor to guess under which of three small cups (or thimbles ) a pea -sized object has been placed after the party operating the game rapidly rearranges them, providing opportunity for sleight-of-hand trickery ; a shell game .
